alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 8:57PM MST until December 28 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with amounts up to 5 inches on higher peaks. Wind gusts to 35 mph will produce blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Idaho portion of the northern Wasatch Mountains, including Emigration Summit. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility and create temporary road closures.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
